com.std.controller.listener

Class DateSelectionMouseListener

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.std.controller.listener.DateSelectionMouseListener
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.event.MouseListener, java.util.EventListener

    public class DateSelectionMouseListener
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.awt.event.MouseListener
    This class serves as the listener of each day in the view panels.

    • Method Detail

      • mouseClicked

        public void mouseClicked(java.awt.event.MouseEvent e)
        This method is called whenever the user clicks a day in the view. This method then updates the currentDate in the model.
        Specified by:
        mouseClicked in interface java.awt.event.MouseListener
        Parameters:
        MouseEvent - e is the event sent when the day in the panel is clicked.
